alterVM(String, String, String) - Method in class es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.api.InfrastructureManagerApiClient
Change the features of the virtual machine with ID 'vmId' in the infrastructure with with ID 'infId', specified by the RADL document specified in the body contents.
Return a RADL with information about the virtual machine, like GetVMInfo.

C

createInfrastructure(String) - Method in class es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.api.InfrastructureManagerApiClient
Create and configure an infrastructure with the requirements specified in the RADL document of the body contents.
If success, it is returned the URI of the new infrastructure.

The returned string is in RADL format.

reconfigure(String) - Method in class es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.api.InfrastructureManagerApiClient
Perform the reconfigure action in all the virtual machines in the the infrastructure with ID 'infID'.
This method starts the contextualization process again.
To reconfigure the VMs see the reconfigure methods that include the 'radl' parameter.
reconfigure(String, String, int...) - Method in class es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.api.InfrastructureManagerApiClient
Perform the reconfigure action in all the virtual machines in the the infrastructure with ID 'infID.' It updates the configuration of the infrastructure as indicated in the 'radlFile'.
removeResource(String, String, boolean...) - Method in class es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.api.InfrastructureManagerApiClient
Undeploy the virtual machine with ID vmId associated to the infrastructure with ID 'infId'.
The context parameter is optional and is a flag to specify if the contextualization step will be launched just after the VM addition.
As default the contextualization flag is set to True.
RestCallParameter - Class in es.upv.i3m.grycap.im.client
